mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from(select * from board order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select count(*) as count from board

select.if: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from(select * from board where subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from(select * from board where id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select count(*) as count from board where subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select count(*) as count from board where id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.update: update board set subject =#{subject},content=#{content}, logtime=sysdate where seq=#{seq}
update board set hit = hit + 1 where seq=#{seq}
